name: quality_stats
label: Quality Indicators
description: This implementation uses spark to computes statistics

parameters.name: compute_value
parameters.label: 'Value' metadata
parameters.description: Compute Metadata related to 'value' information (min, max, avg, variance, nb points)

parameters.name: compute_time
parameters.label: 'Time' metadata
parameters.description: Compute Metadata related to 'time' information (average, min, max, ref periods, histograms)
